description: Adaptive Framework configuration component for type=requestHandler. This object type is the parent of an _AdaptiveObjectType_ that contains handlerType specific properties.

requestHandlerType.brief: Type of request handler that will process requests directed to this handler
requestHandlerType.description: Type of request handler that will process requests directed to this handler.
requestHandlerType.label: Handler Type

uriPrefix.brief: Prefix of URIs that will be directed to this request handler
uriPrefix.description: Prefix of URIs that will be directed to this request handler.
uriPrefix.label: URI Prefix
